X.iii.1.D.5.a
.
Establishing the Relationship of an Alleged Dependent
If records indicate a Veteran has a dependent that has
not
been established as a dependent for VA purposes, ask the Veteran to complete and return to VA
VA Form 21-686c, Application Request to Add and/or Remove Dependents
, and
VA Form 21P-0969, Income and Asset Statement in Support of Claim for Pension or Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC)
.
References
:  For more information about
the importance of establishing the existence of dependents, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.A.1.c
, and
establishing an individual as a Veteran’s dependent, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.A.2
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D  - Adjusting Pension Under 38 CFR 3.551 and 3.556
